actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to furnish certain information to the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to furnish the House of Representatives the name and (in the case of a member or former member of the armed forces) the service serial number of each individual who was present at the explosion of the atomic device known as "Smoky" which was detonated at Camp Desert Rock, Nevada, on August 31, 1957.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to furnish certain information to the House of Representatives.
